tooltip: Select Kud-Lo, Deku Butler, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Butler Kud-Lo focuses on improving the Deku Mart.
Allows you to summon Butler Kud-Lo, a hovering support hero that attacks with fire.
Hovering Deku Scrub that attacks enemies with ranged Fire breath.
Business Scrubs trade income is increased by 20%.
Deku Marts passively generate trickles of all resources.
